_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Results of the financier's deeds [sn3.20: The financier provided almsfood for Tagarasikhī
As a result, he was reborn seven times in a good place
As a residual result, he held the position of financier seven times in Sāvatthī
As a result, his mind didn't tend to enjoy nice things
The financier murdered his brother's only child for the sake of his fortune
As a result, he burned in hell for many years
As a residual result, he was childless for the seventh time and his fortune ended up in the royal treasury.
